about.title: Star Travel
about.description: Star Travel is a local company providing solutions for convenient ground transportation around Egypt. Our fleet offers fast and expeditiously professional drivers and top-quality vehicles for each transfer service.
about.description2: We do our best to make sure that you will get the best experience during your journey. Whether you're looking for airport transfers, city tours, or full-day adventures, we've got you covered.

tours.fullDayTitle: Full Day Trip To Popular Places in Hurghada
tours.paradiseIsland: Full Day Trip To Paradise Island
tours.paradiseIslandDesc: Experience the beauty of Paradise Island with a full day trip including snorkeling and beach activities.
tours.aboDabbabDesc: Discover the underwater world at Abo Dabbab, one of the best diving spots in Marsa Alam.
tours.desertSafariDesc: Enjoy an exciting desert adventure with quad biking, camel riding, and traditional Bedouin dinner.
tours.cityTourDesc: Explore the best of Hurghada city with our comprehensive 6-hour guided tour.
tours.cairoTrip: Full Day Trip From Hurghada To Cairo
tours.cairoTripDesc: Visit the Pyramids and Sphinx on a full day trip from Hurghada to Cairo.
tours.luxorTrip: Full Day Trip From Hurghada To Luxor
tours.luxorTripDesc: Discover the ancient wonders of Luxor including Valley of the Kings and Karnak Temple.
tours.orangeBay: Full Day Trip To Orange Bay Island
tours.orangeBayDesc: Spend a day at the beautiful Orange Bay Island with crystal clear waters and white sandy beaches.
tours.divingTripDesc: Explore the amazing Red Sea coral reefs with our daily diving trips for all skill levels.
tours.sharmElNagaDesc: Visit the stunning Sharm El Naga bay, perfect for snorkeling and relaxation.
tours.hurghadaTransferDesc: Comfortable and reliable airport transfer service from Hurghada Airport to your hotel or destination.
